scripts.dev:kv: npm run build && npx wrangler pages dev dist --port 5174
scripts.seed:upload: node scripts/seed-scenarios.mjs && npx wrangler kv bulk put --namespace-id=98dff05d785946d0a388c2b7f0a670c2 --remote scripts/scenarios-bulk.json
scripts.seed:players:upload: node scripts/seed-players.mjs && npx wrangler kv bulk put --namespace-id=98dff05d785946d0a388c2b7f0a670c2 --remote scripts/players-bulk.json
